trends.analysis: The TC-S market health indices show stability with slight fluctuations over the past week. The significant indices such as the sentiment index (si) and growth business index (gbi) remain relatively unchanged, while the customer acquisition index (cai) has seen minor declines. Overall, the market is maintaining a steady state without clear bullish or bearish tendencies.
trends.insight: Focus on enhancing customer engagement strategies to boost the customer acquisition index, as it currently shows a downward trend.
